title: WALKWAY ORB / equipping carabineer jacket
description: putting jacket on +1 to revacholian nationhood you fascist man

dialogueTree.title: Half Light: "Wow... this jacket makes you feel *..."
dialogueTree.text: Wow... this jacket makes you feel *strong*. As if your blood is mixing with that of the venerable Filippian loyalists of old.

links.title: You: "Mixing? Does my blood *need* mixing..."
links.text: Mixing? Does my blood *need* mixing? Or is it good as it is?

links.title: Half Light: "Apologies, you're right! The need f..."
links.text: Apologies, you're right! The need for a strong central government has always been clear to you. You're a true patriot of Revachol -- born to do it.

links.title: Half Light: "It's time to clean up the streets a..."
links.text: It's time to clean up the streets and restore the city to its former glory! Whether you like it or not, this jacket gives you serious nationalist cred.

links.title: You: "Oops, I didn't mean to wear a natio..."
links.text: Oops, I didn't mean to wear a nationalist jacket. [Discard the thought -- and the jacket.]

links.title: Half Light: "Yes. Let's hope no one saw you wear..."
links.text: Yes. Let's hope no one saw you wearing that outrageously fascist jacket.
